field.name: OSC32KOUT
field.description: 32 kHz oscillator Clock Output\n Outputs the ERCLK32K on the selected pin in all modes of operation (including LLS/VLLS and System Reset), overriding the existing pin mux configuration for that pin. This field is reset only on POR/LVD

field.name: USBVSTBY
field.description: USB voltage regulator in standby mode during VLPR or VLPW

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: USB voltage regulator not in standby during VLPR or VLPW

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: USB voltage regulator in standby during VLPR or VLPW

field.name: USBSSTBY
field.description: USB voltage regulator in standby mode during Stop, VLPS, LLS or VLLS

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: USB voltage regulator not in standby during Stop, VLPS, LLS or VLLS

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: USB voltage regulator in standby during Stop, VLPS, LLS or VLLS

field.name: URWE
field.description: USB voltage regulator enable write enable

field.name: UVSWE
field.description: USB voltage regulator VLP standby write enable

field.name: USSWE
field.description: USB voltage regulator stop standby write enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: RTC 1 Hz clock drives RTC CLKOUT

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: RTC 32 kHz clock drives RTC CLKOUT

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0X
enumeratedValue.description: All off-chip accesses (instruction and data) via the Flexbus are disallowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Off-chip instruction accesses are disallowed. Data accesses are allowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Off-chip instruction accesses and data accesses are allowed

field.name: USBSRC
field.description: USB clock source select\n Selects the clock source for the USB 48 MHz clock

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: MCGPLLCLK/MCGFLLCLK/IRC48M clock divided by the USB fractional divider

field.name: LPUARTSRC
field.description: LPUART clock source select\n Selects the clock source for the LPUART transmit and receive clock

field.name: FTM1CH0SRC
field.description: FTM1 channel 0 input capture source select

field.name: FTM2CH0SRC
field.description: FTM2 channel 0 input capture source select

field.name: FTM2CH1SRC
field.description: FTM2 channel 1 input capture source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Exclusive OR of FTM2_CH1, FTM2_CH0 and FTM1_CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated by FTM1 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated by FTM2 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated by FTM1 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated by FTM2 CH0

field.name: LPUART0RXSRC
field.description: LPUART0 Receive Data Source Select\n Selects the source for the LPUART0 receive data

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM0, \n software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM1, \n software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM2, \n software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM3, \n software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH0 pin is output of FTM0 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH0 pin is output of FTM0 CH0, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH1 pin is output of FTM0 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH1 pin is output of FTM0 CH1, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH2 pin is output of FTM0 channel 2 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH2 pin is output of FTM0 channel 2 output, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH3 pin is output of FTM0 channel 3 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH3 pin is output of FTM0 channel 3 output, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH4 pin is output of FTM0 channel 4 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH4 pin is output of FTM0 channel 4 output, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH5 pin is output of FTM0 channel 5 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH5 pin is output of FTM0 channel 5 output, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH6 pin is output of FTM0 channel 6 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH6 pin is output of FTM0 channel 6 output, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH7 pin is output of FTM0 channel 7 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH7 pin is output of FTM0 channel 7 output, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH0 pin is output of FTM3 channel 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH0 pin is output of FTM3 channel 0 output modulated by FTM2 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH1 pin is output of FTM3 channel 1 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH1 pin is output of FTM3 channel 1 output modulated by FTM2 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH2 pin is output of FTM3 channel 2 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH2 pin is output of FTM3 channel 2 output modulated by FTM2 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH3 pin is output of FTM3 channel 3 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH3 pin is output of FTM3 channel 3 output modulated by FTM2 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH4 pin is output of FTM3 channel 4 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH4 pin is output of FTM3 channel 4 output modulated by FTM2 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH5 pin is output of FTM3 channel 5 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH5 pin is output of FTM3 channel 5 output modulated by FTM2 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH6 pin is output of FTM3 channel 6 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH6 pin is output of FTM3 channel 6 output modulated by FTM2 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH7 pin is output of FTM3 channel 7 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3_CH7 pin is output of FTM3 channel 7 output modulated by FTM2 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b010
enumeratedValue.description: K3x Family or K1x/K6x Family (with tamper)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b011
enumeratedValue.description: K4x Family or K2x Family (with tamper)

field.name: SERIESID
field.description: Kinetis Series ID: Specifies the Kinetis series of the device

field.name: FTM3
field.description: FTM3 Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the FTM3 module

field.name: ADC1
field.description: ADC1 Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the ADC1 module

field.name: DAC1
field.description: DAC1 Clock Gate Control This bit controls the clock gate to the DAC1 module

field.name: RNGA
field.description: RNGA Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the RNGA module

field.name: LPUART0
field.description: LPUART0 Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the LPUART0 module

field.name: USBFRAC
field.description: USB clock divider fraction\n This field sets the fraction multiply value for the fractional clock divider when the MCGFLLCLK/ MCGPLLCLK clock is the USB clock source (SOPT2[USBSRC] = 1).\n Divider output clock = Divider input clock*[(USBFRAC+1)/(USBDIV+1)]

field.name: USBDIV
field.description: USB clock divider divisor\n This field sets the divide value for the fractional clock divider when the MCGFLLCLK/MCGPLLCLK clock is the USB clock source (SOPT2[USBSRC] = 1).\n Divider output clock = Divider input clock*[(USBFRAC+1)/(USBDIV+1)]

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Flash remains enabled during Wait mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Flash is disabled for the duration of Wait mode

field.name: MAXADDR0
field.description: Max address block 0\n This field concatenated with 13 trailing zeros indicates the first invalid address of flash block 0 (program flash 0). For example, if MAXADDR0 = 0x20 the first invalid address of flash block 0 is 0x0004_0000. This would be the MAXADDR0 value for a device with 256 KB program flash in flash block 0
